languages.text: "Один ашмаг выстоял против всей стражи усадьбы и продолжает чинить проблемы? На Ифрите его бы давно возвели в чин капитана и поставили лично охранять губернатора — ибо, видит Великий, из вас всех он здесь самый толковый!"

"One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"
languages.original_text: "Один ашмаг выстоял против всей стражи усадьбы и продолжает чинить проблемы? На Ифрите его бы давно возвели в чин капитана и поставили лично охранять губернатора — ибо, видит Великий, из вас всех он здесь самый толковый!"

traits.locale_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

"One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

"One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

"One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

"One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

languages.text: 「ひとりのクズがこの屋敷すべてのワーデンと対峙しておきながら、まだ問題を起こしているのか？イフリートでは、そいつはすでに中隊長に任命され、総督の警備を任されていただろう。なぜなら、奴にはお前ら全員の脳みそを合わせた以上の頭脳があることをエグザルテッド・ワンは知っているからだ！」
languages.original_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

traits.locale_text: 「ひとりのクズがこの屋敷すべてのワーデンと対峙しておきながら、まだ問題を起こしているのか？イフリートでは、そいつはすでに中隊長に任命され、総督の警備を任されていただろう。なぜなら、奴にはお前ら全員の脳みそを合わせた以上の頭脳があることをエグザルテッド・ワンは知っているからだ！」

languages.text: « Un seul ashmag arrive à tenir tête à tous vos gardiens ? Sur Éfrit, il serait déjà devenu capitaine et on lui aurait confié la protection du gouverneur. Par l'Exalté, il doit avoir plus de jugeote que vous tous réunis ! »
languages.original_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

traits.locale_text: « Un seul asmag arrive à tenir tête à tous vos gardiens ? Sur Éfrit, il serait déjà devenu capitaine et on lui aurait confié la protection du gouverneur. Par l'Exalté, il doit avoir plus de jugeote que vous tous réunis ! »

languages.text: “这么一个坏种，就足以对付整座庄园里所有的看守，而且还在负隅顽抗？这要是在艾弗里特，他早就被任命为安保队长，负责总督的安全了。因为至高无上的神皇明白，他比你们剩下的人加起来更有能耐！”
languages.original_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

traits.locale_text: “这么一个坏家伙，就足以对付整座庄园里所有的看守，而且还在负隅顽抗？这要是在艾弗里特，他早就被任命为安保队长，负责总督的安全了。因为至高无上的神皇明白，他比你们剩下的人加起来更有能耐！”

languages.text: «¿Tanta guerra está dando un solo ashmag contra todos los guardias de esta hacienda? En Efreet, ya lo habrían nombrado capitán y puesto a cargo de la seguridad del gobernador. ¡Solo el Exaltado sabe que tiene más luces que todos ustedes juntos!».
languages.original_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tanta guerra está dando un solo ashmag contra todos los guardias de esta hacienda? En Efreet, ya lo habrían nombrado capitán y puesto a cargo de la seguridad del gobernador. ¡Solo el Exaltado sabe que tiene más luces que todos ustedes juntos!».

languages.text: "Ein einziger Ashmag gegen sämtliche Wächter auf dem Anwesen, und dennoch macht er Schwierigkeiten? Auf Efreet wäre er bereits zum Hauptmann ernannt worden und wäre für die Sicherheit des Gouverneurs zuständig. Denn der Erhabene weiß, er hat mehr Verstand als ihr alle zusammen!"
languages.original_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

traits.locale_text: "Ein einziger Ashmag gegen sämtliche Wächter auf dem Anwesen, und dennoch macht er Schwierigkeiten? Auf Efreet wäre er bereits zum Hauptmann ernannt worden und wäre für die Sicherheit des Gouverneurs zuständig. Denn der Erhabene weiß, er hat mehr Verstand als ihr alle zusammen!"

languages.text: "Tek bir külboğaz, karşısında konağın tüm dizdarları olmasına rağmen sorun çıkarıyor, öyle mi? Böyle biri İfrit'te çoktan yüzbaşı yapılıp valinin güvenliğinden sorumlu tutulmuştu bile. Görkemli bilir ki hepinizin toplamından daha fazla aklı var!"
languages.original_text: "One ashmag is up against all the wardens on this estate, yet he is still causing trouble? On Efreet, he would have already been made captain and put in charge of the governor's security — for the Exalted One knows that he has more brains than all of you combined!"

traits.locale_text: "Tek bir külboğazlı, karşısında konağın tüm muhafızları olmasına rağmen sorun çıkarıyor, öyle mi? Böyle biri Efreet'te çoktan yüzbaşı yapılıp valinin güvenliğinden sorumlu tutulmuştu bile. Görkemli bilir ki hepinizin toplamından daha fazla aklı var!"
